txt.en: <rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ghashn√¢kh has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The southern flag of Gondamon is wrapped around Arfinn. It should be hung to fly at the south gate once more</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The horn of Thrastar sounds from the south camp. The leader of the southern assault is coming to reclaim the planted flag of Gondamon</rgb>
'You fall back and regroup at the Keep. We'll push forward!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A deep voice roars from outside the South Gate. 'I will dance as Gondamon burns!'</rgb>
'Gondamon has been a free city so long as I have ever known.'
'The Dourhand wish to take that from you. To take your homes, and slaughter your families!'
'But I say not today. I say we stand. I say we fight!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are on the march to the north!</rgb>

'This is all I get for reinforcements? I suppose you will have to do. We've defended this keep for as long as we could, but I fear the next push might be our last.\n\n'Head to the walls and let them come to you. Perhaps th
